{pages:['# Golems love the
# truth.
# If they see
# anything truthy,
# they can\'t help
# but follow.

let success = true

if success
 print("I will follow...")
 move(1, 0, -1)
end', '# Blank strings, empty arrays and objects, zero and false are not truthy.

# Every other value however, is
